messages.content: I need new trousers. But I am in the process of losing weight. Should I wait with the trousers?

It's a good idea to wait until you have reached your weight loss goal before buying new trousers. This will ensure that the trousers fit well and look flattering on you. Congratulations on your progress!
How do I become a black belt karateka?

Becoming a black belt karateka takes dedication, hard work, and consistent practice. You should start by finding a good karate school or instructor to train with. Attend classes regularly and work on perfecting your technique. As you progress, you may be eligible to test for belt promotions. Remember to always prioritize safety and take breaks when needed. Good luck!
